name: Multisite Dashboard Switcher
author: Sam J Levy

sections.description: The Multisite Dashboard Switcher is a plugin written for WordPress that allows multisite administrators to easily switch between Dashboards. MSDS provides convenient access to options pages across every site in the network, reducing the number of clicks necessary to manage settings. For larger networks, sites can be grouped by letter.
sections.changelog:
1.5.1

January 29, 2024

  • Tested up to 6.4.2
  • Updated GPL license

1.5

July 12, 2021

  • Tested up to 5.8
  • Updated screenshot/icons

1.4

December 1, 2011

  • Fixed: Issue with detection of Network Admin URL
  • Added: Improved localization support

1.3

November 22, 2011

  • Added: Option to show site ID’s in menu

1.2

November 14, 2011

  • Added: Support for MU installations that have a hybrid of both subdomain and subdir URLs

1.1

November 5, 2011

  • Fixed: Subdomain multisites
  • Added: Visit link for each site, HTTPS persistence on links

1.0

November 2, 2011

  • First version released
